name: dfs.client.socketcache.expiryMsec
description: Socket cache expiration for short-circuit reads in msec.

name: dfs.batched.ls.limit
description:
Limit the number of paths that can be listed in a single batched
    listing call. printed by ls. If less or equal to
    zero, at most DFS_LIST_LIMIT_DEFAULT (= 1000) will be printed.

name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.retry.interval
description:
The number of milliseconds the submitter of the job wants to
    wait before job end notification is retried if it fails. This is capped by
    mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.retry.interval

name: dfs.checksum.ec.socket-timeout
description:
Default timeout value in milliseconds for computing the checksum of striped blocks.
    Recommended to set the same value between client and DNs in a cluster because mismatching
    may cause exhausting handler threads.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruct.read.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the EC reconstruction can utilize for reading.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.

name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.
